remarks: Value of the norm of a Hilbert space operator.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmopval $p |- ( T : ~H --> ~H -> ( normop ` T ) = sup ( { x | E. y e. ~H ( ( normh ` y ) <_ 1 /\ x = ( normh ` ( T ` y ) ) ) } , RR* , < ) ) $.
$d T x y $.
